name: BRACELET I
description:
This handmade delicate bracelet is made of Lapis Lazuli gemstone beads and Thai Karen Hill Tribe beads. Material:
Lapis Lazuli gemstone beads (4 mm)
Thai Karen Hill Tribe silver beads (3 mm)
Sterling silver closing clasp
Pure red silk cord Bracelet length:19.5 cm KAREN HILL beads have been crafted by Karen Hill Tribe in Thailand. Purchasing this bracelet you will be supporting their tribe business as well. Their silver is a high purity (97%-99%) that will not tarnish as readily as sterling silver (92.5%). The Karen's tools can be anything from nails, chisels to scrap metal. All of the hill tribes work with silver, but only the Karen have made silversmithing their profession, and their techniques are now passed down to each generation, enabling them to use their craft to sustain the tribe as a whole. LAPIS LAZULI is said to be one of the first gemstones known to be used for jewellery. It is also known as the stone of friendship and truth. The blue stone is said to encourage harmony in relationships and help its wearer to be authentic and give his or her opinion openly. The ancient egyptians used lapis lazuli as a symbol of truth." For more pictures go to BLOG section please. We ship worldwide.

name: BRACELET II
description:
This handmade delicate bracelet is made of Lapis Lazuli gemstone beads and Thai Karen Hill Tribe beads.

Material: 
Lapis Lazuli gemstone beads (4 mm) 

Thai Karen Hill Tribe silver beads (2.5 mm) 

Sterling silver closing clasp 

Sterling silver wire

Bracelet length:19.5 cm

KAREN HILL beads have been crafted by Karen Hill Tribe in Thailand. Purchasing this bracelet you will be supporting their tribe business as well. Their silver is a high purity (97%-99%) that will not tarnish as readily as sterling silver (92.5%). The Karen's tools can be anything from nails, chisels to scrap metal. All of the hill tribes work with silver, but only the Karen have made silversmithing their profession, and their techniques are now passed down to each generation, enabling them to use their craft to sustain the tribe as a whole.

LAPIS LAZULI is said to be one of the first gemstones known to be used for jewellery. It is also known as the stone of friendship and truth. The blue stone is said to encourage harmony in relationships and help its wearer to be authentic and give his or her opinion openly. The ancient egyptians used lapis lazuli as a symbol of truth."

For more pictures go to BLOG section please.

We ship worldwide.

name: BRACELET III
description:
This handmade delicate bracelet is made of Red Garnet gemstones and sterling silver. Material:
Red Garnet gemstone beads (3 mm)
Sterling silver lucky horse shoe handmade in Florida
Sterling silver clasp
Sterling silver wire Bracelet length: 18.5 cm Garnet beads represent love, and are said to control anger. They are most commonly a deep red colour, and have been used as gemstones historically especially as an inlay in gold cells in the cloisonn√© technique found from Anglo saxon England. For more pictures go to BLOG section please. We ship worldwide.

name: BRACELET IV
description:
This handmade bracelet is made of Sterling silver and cotton cord. Material:
Sterling silver button handmade in Florida
Sterling silver beads (4 mm)
Red waxed cotton cord Bracelet length: 18.5 cm The Red String/Cord protects from the influences of the Evil Eye. In historic tradition, the Evil Eye is a very powerful negative force. It refers to the unfriendly stare and unkind glances we sometimes get from people around us. For more pictures go to BLOG section please. We ship worldwide.
